scripts.ios:prebuild: bundle install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install --repo-update
scripts.build:ios: react-native build-ios --scheme NitroArkExample --mode Debug --extra-params "-sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO"
scripts.build:ios:xcode: xcodebuild build -workspace ios/NitroArkExample.xcworkspace -scheme NitroArkExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -quiet ARCHS=arm64
